items.name: simple_configmap
items.description: A simple configmap demo with only basic configuration

items.name: immutable_configmap
items.description: [k8s v1.19+] Set immutable field as true to ensures that data stored in the ConfigMap cannot be updated (only object metadata can be modified).

items.name: binary_data_configmap
items.description: BinaryData can contain byte sequences that are not in the UTF-8 range. The keys stored in BinaryData must not overlap with the ones in the Data field, this is enforced during validation process.
